ISSUE.TITLE: Ansible 2.9.4 in AWX?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi all, on my host system, I already have Ansible 2.9.4 installed. After writing a playbook with ios_vlans and importing it to AWX, I noticed, that AWX is still running Ansible 2.8.5, where ios_vlans is not implemented. When will 2.9.x come to AWX or is there a way to manually update Ansible in AWX? Cheers, Marcus

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5831 from rooftopcellist/bump-receptorctl-1.2.3 Bump receptorctl to 1.2.3
